sentences.en: 10,000 deaths a year from chronic lung disease are attributable to smoking.
sentences.cn: 吸烟导致每年有1万人死于慢性肺病。

sentences.en: A hypnotherapist will hypnotize you and will stop you from smoking.
sentences.cn: 一位催眠治疗师将对你实施催眠，从而帮你戒烟。

sentences.en: Abdel felt free to tick him off for smoking too much.
sentences.cn: 阿卜杜勒动辄责骂他抽烟太凶。

sentences.en: California no longer allows smoking areas in restaurants.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚州不再允许在饭店里设吸烟区。

sentences.en: Doctors with glazed eyes sat chain-smoking in front of a television set.
sentences.cn: 医生们目光呆滞地坐在电视机前一支接一支地抽着烟。

sentences.en: Hypnotherapy can be useful in helping you give up smoking.
sentences.cn: 催眠疗法可能有助于你戒烟。

sentences.en: I've been told to lose weight and stop smoking.
sentences.cn: 我被告知要减肥并戒烟。

sentences.en: Jackson said her boss became increasingly depressed and reverted to smoking heavily.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊说她的老板情绪越来越低落，又开始拼命抽烟了。

sentences.en: Most people who smoke began smoking in their teens.
sentences.cn: 多数烟民从十几岁时就开始抽烟了。

sentences.en: One could argue that smoking, by its very nature, is addictive.
sentences.cn: 有人可能认为抽烟从本质上说就具有成瘾性。

sentences.en: Ramesh had reclined his seat and was lying back smoking.
sentences.cn: 拉梅什把椅背调低，倚在上面吸烟。

sentences.en: She beseeched him to cut his drinking and his smoking.
Single room in lovely flat, roof terrace, non-smoking prof., woman pref.
sentences.cn: 舒适公寓中的单间，带屋顶阳台，不抽烟的职业人士，女士优先。

sentences.en: Smoking is now banned in many places of work.
sentences.cn: 现在许多工作场所禁止吸烟。
告示牌上写着“禁止吸烟”。

sentences.en: They enjoy themselves drinking wine, smoking and playing cards.
sentences.cn: 他们又是喝酒抽烟，又是打牌，玩得很痛快。

sentences.en: Well, parenthetically, I was trying to quit smoking at the time.
sentences.cn: 嗯，插一句，我那时正在努力戒烟。

words.tran_cn: 冒烟的；烟熏味的；熏着的；呛人的；烟状的

phrases.tran_cn: 禁止吸烟（标语）；请勿吸烟（标语）

trans.tran_en: A smoking area is intended for people who want to smoke
the activity of breathing in tobacco smoke from a cigarette, pipe etc

trans.tran_cn: 冒烟( smoke的现在分词)，抽烟，用烟熏制，吸（烟）
